title: Introducing Cricut Explore Air
description: Go from inspiration to creation with Cricut Explore Air, the most advanced electronic cutting machine for DIY enthusiasts. This system features embedded Bluetooth technology for wireless cutting. Use your desktop computer, laptop, or iPad with the new Cricut Design Space iPad app.

asset.author: Official Cricut
asset.description: Go from inspiration to creation with Cricut Explore Air, the most advanced electronic cutting machine for DIY enthusiasts. This system features embedded Bluetooth technology for wireless cutting. Use your desktop computer, laptop, or iPad with the new Cricut Design Space iPad app.

transcripts: Introducing the Cricut Explore Air a wireless design and cut system that is so easy to use you'll be making projects in minutes. Cricut Explore Air cuts a wide variety of materials even cuts thicker materials like leather and felt and look even the most delicate cuts are so clean. Cricut free design space software lets you design everywhere whether you're at home on your computer or you're out and about with your iPad, design space is cloud-based so you can start a project on your iPad and pick it up to finish it on your computer later. Cricut Explore Air lets you cut your own design for free, just upload your own images add them to your project and start cutting you can even use fonts from your computer for free fonts are great because the Cricut Explore Air can both cut and write them, it can even draw your images too. If you don't have your own designs don't worry you can always browse through the ever-expanding 50,000 image library, images start at just 99 cents. You will be amazed at how often you'll be making projects personalizing things like a wedding gift, a quick thank you card or even a new cover for your phone and making bigger projects special like your little girls entire birthday party. Decorations, invitations, party favors or even that last-minute science fair project. Design your own project from scratch or to make it even faster you can select from hundreds of make it now projects with Cricut Explore Air you can go from inspiration to creation everywhere.
